extendedInfo.description: "Call block" is a free full-featured app to block harassing phone calls and SMS for you. And we've detailed the methods of blocking, you can stop calls or SMS from the same number. This app will be a good help to avoid harassment when you at work, meetings, driving, rest, but yet remain grace.Compared with the same type of apps, there are no difficult settings or complicated operations in "call block". We offer you a dynamic designed main interface, so you can get to know your blocking mode instead of getting into the settings.We offer four block modes, the dynamic interface will change automatically, so you can know the current mode easily (block modes available: Block all, Block blacklists only,Accept whitelists only, Accept contacts only)This app also provides answering modes. There are four modes: Power off, Busy, No service, The number is not in service. (Only featured in Simplified Chinese version)There is a general switch that you can change blocking mode to non-blocking mode immediately without getting into the settings.* All calls from the blocking number list will be blocked. You can check details in call block record.* All SMS from the blocking number list will be blocked. You can check details in SMS block record.* Add numbers into black and white lists here. You can choose to block both or either of calls and SMS from Blacklist. The calls and SMS from numbers in Whitelist are defaulted unblocked, but you can modify as you want. The block rules can be modified in block mode.* One column is call block record where the information of blocked calls will be displayed here, you can delete the records. The other column is SMS block record where the information of blocked SMS will be displayed here, you can delete the records.* The Simplified Chinese version has one more feature which allows the user to select answering modes. There are four modes:Power off,Busy,No service,The number is not in service. * When block occurs,an icon will notify you on the taskbar. Touch to check block information.Your suggestions and requests would be highly appreciated, please make comments on market review or send email to us.

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: The app dosen\'t work ..so far the worst app in android market , tried with all the mentioned settings but still getting calls from blacklist contacts..its not worth even a single star but thats the lowest I can give..
reviews.author: Tanvir Anwar

reviews.title: Call block
reviews.comment: This call block is coming off my phone calls to whoever I\'m talking to and will not let noon of my phone calls on my contact list come through you need to fix this so that it can be properly used what I have it on it locks on my calls this app is good I like it but the wait is now I can\'t use it I don\'t want to be when I have a call or when I am taking care a business I depend on this call block but this needs to be improved or fits this is why I\'m giving you 2 stars. need to really look at your app.
reviews.author: James White

reviews.title: still searching
reviews.comment: This is probably my 5th call blocking app. Honestly I don\'t want to know when I missed a blocked call. Granted, it blocked it, but I don\'t care. If it wasn\'t in my contacts, I don\'t need them calling me. I want a call blocker that does just that-block the call, don\'t tell me about it. I even set \"No notification\" but it still notified me. Also, it says there are several modes, but I can\'t find a setting to pick a mode. I\'m a little confused.
reviews.author: Michelle Cooper

reviews.title: Blocks
reviews.comment: This, no matter how I had it configured or who I had on what list, blocked everything and everyone. So yes it blocks incoming calls and texts from unwanted numbers.... And also everyone else.
reviews.author: Stacy E.

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: try the one next on the list this one does not work, for about five rings nothing comes through but then the call shows up
reviews.author: Saiya Shinta

reviews.comment: Waste of time. Its allowing all calls even if black listed. Useless app uninstalled\nLg p500
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: fraudulent
reviews.comment: Numbers in black list still can call & text wtf!
reviews.author: DREW GILLS

reviews.title: Notification ads are not ok
reviews.comment: I don\'t know when notification ads were introduced to this app, but  it\'s enough for me to uninstall.   I know there\'s the option of blocking the app\'s notifications, but must users won\'t know how to do that and there\'s no indication that it\'s this app generating the ads.
reviews.author: Graham Bae

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Bobby Ertanto

reviews.title: Works somewhow
reviews.comment: Go to settings in this app and check \"Block all calls\". This done what i wished till now. Blocking particular call didn\'t work. So my 3 stars to this app.
reviews.author: Satish Satz

reviews.title: Bug
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried emailing regarding the issue but your email seems to be invalid. Great app but it\'s blocking everyone. If contacts are added to white list, it allows calls but not sms. I have to import contacts from messages to allow or enter them manually to the white list... too much work!
reviews.author: Ana Baires

reviews.title: Shit.......!!
reviews.comment: Waste app rubbish

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: WTF cant even block any call

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Would be better if I could edit and auto reply. Letting the sender know they are blocked so they will not keep sending SMS and/or calls

reviews.comment: Very bad app

reviews.comment: Deleting this immediately. Has ads that pop up in your notification bar from time to time... sneaky
